title: How many words are there in the English language? | OxfordWords blog
text:
Home > How many words are there in the English language? How many words are there in the English language? 
How do you count words? Ashley Wagner discusses the question as part of our video on the number of words in the English language. 
Find out more about the the number of words in English language . 
The opinions and other information contained in OxfordWords blog posts and comments do not necessarily reflect the opinions or positions of Oxford University Press. Author
